name: Hilda IV
description:
Introducing Hilda IV, the third game in the Hilda series!  It is a tight, action-packed 2D platformer based on some unique twists on the 2D platformer genre.

Credits:
Music by Fesliyan Studios
Sound effects by freesound

p.s. let me know if you think I should expand the game.  I'm taking a break from game making for a few months, but I might be able to make some more levels after that.
